works.name: Largestinfo Web Portal
works.description: This was the first complete website I ever built. Through the IAESTE student exchange program for internships, I worked in the improvement of the company web portal. Used basic HTML/CSS and Javascript.

works.name: FISTA'16
works.description: FISTA is a yearly event organized at ISCTE-IUL. In 2016 I took the challenge to develop the event's website alongside other colleagues. This website built using the bootstrap CSS framework, and PHP/mySQL scripting to handle participants registration.

works.name: LabProjectos
works.description: This was a quick landing page project for a small architecture, engineering and construction agency, in which I implemented the design requested by the client. In this project I got to use the Susy SASS framework in order to build a custom grid architecture.
